title: How does Google's new update affect websites? - Quora

response.answer_text: Google's New Algorithm Update (Broad-Core) Danny Sullivan, from Google, has announced a new algorithm update which is a broad core in nature. Here is my google analytics data of my 30-day old site. On 1st April I submitted this site on Google Search console MY SITE BASIC DATA NICHE: TECHTOTAL POSTS: 40Daily 1 postTraffic source: 95% from Google ( ORGANIC)Site Old: 38daysBacklink: 20 Referring domainStrategy: Quality ContentTry to write 100 times better articles than my competitor article Now I am getting 1k+ user daily and 2.5k+ pageviews. Inshallah It will reach 5k+ views before month-end Ranking using Quality Content and the power of SEO As per my experience, all of my sites are doing really good after this update.
